title: Can You Make a Group Chat on TikTok? Here’s How

steps.title: Open your Inbox on TikTok.
steps.content: Open your Inbox on TikTok. Open the TikTok app and select the Inbox icon from the menu at the bottom of the screen. From here, you’ll see all of your direct messages and have the option to start a group chat.

steps.title: Click the Chat icon in the top left corner.
steps.content: Click the Chat icon in the top left corner. Look for the icon that looks like 2 people with a plus sign (+) and tap on it. This brings up a pop-up menu for starting a new message or group chat with your friends. [1] X Research source Alternatively, choose a chat you’ve already started with your friend, tape the 3 dots in the top right corner, and select Create group chat from the menu.

steps.title: Choose the friends you want to add to your group chat.
steps.content: Choose the friends you want to add to your group chat. You can only add people that you follow and also follow you to a group chat. Choose the people from your friends list that you want to include. [2] X Research source Up to 32 people can be in a group chat, so you can invite up to 31 other friends.

steps.title: Tap on Create group chat to finish making one.
steps.content: Tap on Create group chat to finish making one. The new group chat will appear in your inbox right away so you can start sharing videos with a group of friends.

steps.title: Tap the Share button on the video.
steps.content: Tap the Share button on the video. The icon looks like a curved-arrow near the bottom-right corner of the video. This opens the Send To menu, which allows you to share the video with others. Alternatively, long press on the video, and a menu will appear on the screen. Click Share with to open the different options for sending the video.

steps.title: Select the friends you want to add to the chat.
steps.content: Select the friends you want to add to the chat. You'll see the profile pics of several of your TikTok friends at the top of the Send To menu. Tap the profile photo of each friend you want to add to the chat. If you don't see everyone you want to add, scroll to the right and tap More to see a full list of your TikTok friends. Scroll through the list or type their name in the search bar at the top.

steps.title: Select the “Create group chat with friends” option.
steps.content: Select the “Create group chat with friends” option. As soon as you choose multiple people you want to send the video to, the option will appear at the bottom of your screen. Tap on the circle next to the option to start the group message. [3] X Research source If you don’t select this option before hitting send, then the video will be sent to each person separately.

steps.title: Type a message if you want.
steps.content: Type a message if you want. If you want to say anything about the video (or let your friends know that you're creating a group chat), type your own message into the "Write a message” text box at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Send to create the group chat.
steps.content: Tap Send to create the group chat. This sends the selected video (and your message, if you wrote one) to the friends you selected in a new group chat. If you want to confirm that it worked, then head over to your Inbox. The group chat icon will have all the profile pictures of the friends you added.

steps.title: How do I change TikTok group chat settings?
steps.content: How do I change TikTok group chat settings? Open up the the group chat on your device and click on the 3 dots in the top-right corner. From there, you have access to multiple settings for your group chat. Click on Change Name to rename the group chat. Anyone in your group can change the name again later on. Tap Mute group to silence message notifications.a Choose Pin to top if you want the group chat at the top of your inbox when you open it. Select Share group to send the group chat to other users or share a link to the chat using different apps. Click Leave group to remove yourself from the chat. Tap on Add members to invite other TikTok friends to the message. Select the flag icon if you need to report the group chat for any inappropriate messages or behavior.

steps.title: How many people can be in a TikTok group chat?
steps.content: How many people can be in a TikTok group chat? You can have up to 32 people in your group chat. You can select everyone when you first start the group chat, or you can add people later on if you missed someone.

steps.title: Why don’t I have group chats on TikTok?
steps.content: Why don’t I have group chats on TikTok? You may not have group chats if you’re between 13 and 15. Group chats are only available to users who are 16 and older, so the feature will not appear in your app if you’re any younger. [4] X Research source If you’re 16 or 17, you can only join group chats if you’re friends with one other member in the group.

steps.title: How do you send a TikTok to multiple people?
steps.content: How do you send a TikTok to multiple people? Social media influencer Jenna Jean Davis says, “Click the arrow button on the right-hand side of a TikTok video under the comment button). Click the [multiple] people you want to send it to. Then click the red “Send” button. This will send it to each person individually in your TikTok messages.”

steps.title: Create a group text message for sharing TikTok videos.
steps.content: Create a group text message for sharing TikTok videos. Whether you're using an Android, iPhone, or iPad, you can easily create a group text containing everyone you want to share TikToks with. Then simply share the links to your favorite TikTok videos directly to the chat. Tap the Share icon on a video you want to share with a group of friends. [5] X Research source Tap SMS on the Send To screen. This opens a new text message. Type the names of your contacts or enter their phone numbers for who you want to send the TikTok to. Tap the Send button to send the message. When you want to send another video to the chat, tap Share on a video, select Copy link , and paste the link to the video in the group conversation.

steps.title: Share TikToks in a group Instagram DM.
steps.content: Share TikToks in a group Instagram DM. TikTok makes it easy to share videos with other Instagram users through Direct Messages or by posting to your Story. Tap Share on a video. Tap More on the Send To screen. Tap Instagram Direct . Select the people you want to add to the chat and tap Share to form the group chat To send more videos to the same chat later, just tap Share on a video, select Copy link , and paste it into the existing chat. Alternatively, select Instagram from the list to post it as a Reel or Story on your profile.

steps.title: Share TikTok videos in group chats on any platform.
steps.content: Share TikTok videos in group chats on any platform. If you're using WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, or any other platform that allows you to create group chats, you can easily send a TikTok video to the whole group at once. Just tap Share on a video, select Copy link , and paste the link into the chat. The video will either open in the TikTok app if the other person has the app, or they will be able to view it from a web browser.
